title: Cured
description: Justine is a public school teacher who is just barely able to afford rent in New York City. When she returns to the suburbs for her mother’s wedding, she meets a man in a bar and they bond. Although she doesn’t usually go home with men she’s just met, something about this one is different. They share the best night of sex that Justine has ever experienced—a night she hopes to remember for the rest of her life.It doesn’t take long for her to learn, however, that the hot stranger is none other than the wealthy son of her mom’s new husband—making him Justine’s new (hot and wealthy) stepbrother.In this short story featuring a stepbrother romance, Justine must decide whether her happiness is worth navigating the forbidden nature of their relationship. Can she overcome her reservations about his lavish lifestyle and their status as step-siblings? Or will she resist his temptations and suffer the loneliness of her moral high ground?
author: Olivia Myers
